refsect1.title: Object Hierarchy
refsect1.screen: GObject ├── GstPlayerMediaInfo ╰── GstPlayerStreamInfo ├── GstPlayerAudioInfo ├── GstPlayerSubtitleInfo ╰── GstPlayerVideoInfo

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if the media is seekable.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if the media is live.

refsect2.title: gst_player_media_info_get_image_sample ()
refsect2.para: Function to get the image (or preview-image) stored in taglist. Application can use gst_sample_*_() API's to get caps, buffer etc.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the tags contained in media info.

refsect2.title: gst_player_stream_info_get_index ()
refsect2.para: Function to get stream index from GstPlayerStreamInfo instance.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the stream index of this stream.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the tags contained in this stream.

refsect2.title: gst_player_stream_info_get_codec ()
refsect2.para: A string describing codec used in GstPlayerStreamInfo.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: codec string or NULL on unknown.

refsect2.title: gst_player_stream_info_get_stream_type ()
refsect2.para: Function to return human readable name for the stream type of the given info (ex: "audio", "video", "subtitle")

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the number of audio channels in GstPlayerAudioInfo.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the language of the stream, or NULL if unknown.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the audio maximum bitrate in GstPlayerAudioInfo.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the audio sample rate in GstPlayerAudioInfo.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the current bitrate of video in GstPlayerVideoInfo.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the height of video in GstPlayerVideoInfo.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the width of video in GstPlayerVideoInfo.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the maximum bitrate of video in GstPlayerVideoInfo.

refsect2.title: gst_player_video_info_get_pixel_aspect_ratio ()
refsect2.para: Returns the pixel aspect ratio in par_n and par_d

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the language of the stream, or NULL if unknown.

refsect2.title: GstPlayerMediaInfo
refsect2.para: Structure containing the media information of a URI.

refsect2.title: GstPlayerStreamInfo
refsect2.para: Base structure for information concering a media stream. Depending on the stream type, one can find more media-specific information in GstPlayerVideoInfo, GstPlayerAudioInfo, GstPlayerSubtitleInfo.
